name: Opie: The Defender
description:
You are the first settler of a vacant land. You will construct a village with the riches of this land and seed the very first land of your kingdom! But nords will come to pillage your village and you need to defend it.
Opie: The Defender is an action game involves building a base, crafting weapons and exploring environments with dynamic combat system.

Current Buildings and their functions:

*TownCenter - You can't respawn if there is no Town Center constructed. You can unlock new buildings from here.
*Stable - You acquire an item called "Flute" to call a horse to travel.
*Blacksmith - You can craft different weapons from here.
*Spike - Defense building that will damage only near.
*House - Every house will increase maximum guard towers you can build.
*Warehouse - Every warehouse will increase maximum amount of resources you can get.
*Palisade Wall - Blocks enemies way, first line of defense.
*Guard Tower - This tower can shoot arrows and has medium range with decent damage.
*Stone Wall - Just like Palisade Wall but with more health.
*Canon Tower - This tower has long range and high area of effect damage but slow and low accuracy.
*Temple - When you build temple you can craft divine items.

Every building has 3 upgrade levels and each level increase the effect of the building. Blacksmith and Temple upgrades unlocks better items. Stable upgrades changes your horse tier and appearance.

Current Weapon Types:

*Bow&Arrow
*Sword&Shield
*Waraxe
*Spear
*One-hand Sword
*Two-handed Sword
*Dual Swords

Every weapon has unique combos and playstyle.

Starting Map's size is 2x2 km sq. You are free to construct your village anywhere in the map.
